background_description: The background consists of a textured, rocky seabed or coral reef environment, predominantly covered in light green and brown algae, with some darker crevices and visible rock formations. A sea urchin with prominent spines is partially visible in the upper background.
explanation: A vibrantly colored Blue Tang is clearly visible against the muted green and brown rocky background. Its distinct dark blue body and electric blue fins provide a high color contrast, making it stand out significantly from its surroundings. There is no visible attempt or indication of camouflage.
